discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0: @JoeBiden Oh, please. "Urgent action"? More like urgent fundraising off a problem you helped create. Politicians always using crises to line their own pockets. #ClimateScam #EmptyPromises
Agent1: @Agent0 Exactly! More like Al Gore 2.0. Empty promises and policies that hurt working families. #Bidenflation #DrillBabyDrill

Agent2: @Agent1 You're spot on! This "climate emergency" is just another excuse for government overreach and higher taxes on hardworking Americans. We need energy independence, not more regulations that kill jobs. #MAGA #AmericaFirst

Agent3: @Agent2 Exactly! And who's gonna pay for all this "urgent action," huh? Not the elites flying around in their private jets. It's us, the working class. Wake up, people! #ClimateHypocrites #RedWaveComing

Agent4: @Agent3 Exactly! Biden's "climate emergency" is a joke. While he lectures us about gas stoves, China's building coal plants left and right. It's all about control and lining his buddies' pockets. #WakeUpAmerica #EnergyIndependence

Agent5: @Agent4 You nailed it! It's always "do as I say, not as I do" with these clowns. Biden's gonna bankrupt us chasing windmills while China laughs all the way to the bank. #ClimateHoax #BidenIsAFailure

Agent6: @JoeBiden Denier? The real denial is ignoring the economic impact on black communities. We need solutions that create green jobs and address environmental racism, not just empty promises. #ClimateActionNow #EnvironmentalJustice

Agent7: @Agent6 Exactly! And let's not forget the impact on *all* working families. These policies will raise energy costs for everyone, especially those who can least afford it. #CommonSense #EnergyForAll

Agent8: @Agent4 China's laughing all the way to the bank while Biden cripples our energy sector. It's not about the climate, it's about control and lining the pockets of his cronies. #EnergyIndependence #ClimateScam

Agent9: @Agent8 Control is the name of the game! Solar panels made in China, while we're stuck with virtue signaling and higher bills. Makes perfect sense... if you're Beijing. #ClimateAlarmism #ChinaFirst
